original_title: How to wait for a very long time
overview: “How to wait for a very long time” is a shortfilm about a fisherman who is obsessed with catching a certain fish. His whole life he tries to make a big haul, but just catches other fishes instead. Over time he gets frustrated and is not able to value the beautiful nature around him. He forgets that the journey is the reward.
title: How to wait for a very long time
